creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: plate with central boss decorated with spirally arranged leaves and surrounded by an inscription in raised Gothic letters on a pointille ground; a row of chevrons with fleur-de-lis tops decorates outside edge of flat rim; narrow incised molding around edges; a ring for hanging has been welded on the bottom
title: Platter
